content: I completely understand your frustration. Many consumers feel the same way and are pushing for greater inclusivity in the fashion industry. While some designers have been slow to adopt more inclusive sizing, many others are beginning to expand their ranges and offer styles that fit a wider range of body types. Some designers are also partnering with brands that specialize in inclusive sizing to create more options for their customers. It is important for the industry to recognize and meet the needs of all consumers so that everyone can enjoy fashion that suits their style and body type.
